_description: A simple prayer at the end of one MS of Rolle’s Form of Living — four lines

BodAsh1524.Transcription:
God þat is in magesteOne god & persons threGyf us grace
                    hym to wyn And kepe vs out of dely synAmen par charyte
BodAsh1524.Note:
Occurs at the end of The Form of Living by Richard Rolle, signed
                        ‘Ricardus Hermita exhibente gratia conditoris composuit istum
                        librum ad salutem animarum’ (f. 10v)
BodAsh1524.Editions:
Black,  William Henry. 
             Catalogi Codicum Manuscriptorum Bibliothecae Bodleianae…Pars X,
                A…Catalogue of the Manuscripts bequeathed…by Elias Ashmole.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1845: 1435.
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Popular Prayers in Middle English Verse.” 
             Modern Philology
         36 (1939): 337-50: 339.
